text: Hyperlipidemia happens when there is too many lipids, such as cholesterol, in a person's bloodstream. It can cause a series of health problems. There is a type of hyperlipidemia that runs in families. It is called the familial hyperlipidemia. Cholesterol may be lowered by not being overweight, or by regular physical exercise. Someone's age, race, or sex may also affect cholesterol. ==References== Category:Blood disorders
title: Hyperlipidemia
